thread.title: Hillary Clinton Will Appear on Saturday Night Live with Miley Cyrus Hosting
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Will Appear on Saturday Night Live with Miley Cyrus Hosting

author: TV Guide
title: Hillary Clinton Will Appear on Saturday Night Live with Miley Cyrus Hosting
text: Hillary Clinton Will Appear on Saturday Night Live with Miley Cyrus Hosting It's going to be a party in the U.S.A. this weekend on Saturday Night Live!... Comment   7:10 PM Updated at 9:58 PM   7:10 PM Updated at 9:58 PM Â» Social News It's going to be a party in the U.S.A. this weekend on Saturday Night Live ! Miley Cyrus is hosting the premiere on Saturday, and she's got a very special guest joining the fun: Hillary Rodham Clinton , according to The New York Times. Clinton's campaign has yet to confirm the appearance. But according to the paper, she's going to be joining her cast member doppelganger Kate McKinnon, who does a mean Hills impersonation, in the opening scene. Hillary Clinton shares thoughts on police brutality with Lena Dunham It's certainly not the first time Clinton has appeared on the sketch show. She was there as recently as this past April, and cast members have been portraying her on screen since she was the First Lady back in the '90s. In an interview with CNN , she declined to say which portrayal has been her favorite: "I think I'm the best Hillary Clinton." Season 41 of Saturday Night Live premieres on Saturday at 11:30/10:30c on NBC. WATCH: Hillary Clinton's emoji outreach By TV Guide
